title: MD
biography: Doodh Ka Karz  is a 1990 Indian Bollywood action drama film directed by Ashok Gaekwad and produced by Salim Akhtar. The film was dubbed in Marathi as Dudhache Upkar. It stars Jackie Shroff and Neelam Kothari in pivotal roles.
aiSummary: Sudhir Kothari is a parkinson’s research specialist with an H-index of 7 at Movement Disorders (Member). Has been published in Journal of the Neurological Sciences, Contemporary clinical neuroscience, International Journal of Medical Research & Health Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
